name: Government identifiers
text: Consumer's social security number driver's license state ID card or passport number

name: Account access credentials
text: Account log-in financial account number or credit card number with security code or password

name: Protected characteristics
text: Consumer's racial or ethnic origin religious or philosophical beliefs or union membership

name: Mail and messages
text: Contents of consumer's mail email and text messages unless business is intended recipient

name: Biometric identification
text: Processing of biometric information for purpose of uniquely identifying consumer

name: Health information
text: Personal information collected and analyzed concerning consumer's health

name: Sex life or sexual orientation
text: Personal information collected and analyzed concerning consumer's sex life or sexual orientation
